parameters.name: infrastructureConfigurationArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the infrastructure configuration that you want to retrieve.

nested_items.name: requestId
nested_items.description: The request ID that uniquely identifies this request.

nested_items.name: infrastructureConfiguration
nested_items.description: The infrastructure configuration object.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the infrastructure configuration.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the infrastructure configuration.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the infrastructure configuration.

nested_items.name: instanceTypes
nested_items.description: The instance types of the infrastructure configuration.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: instanceProfileName
nested_items.description: The instance profile of the infrastructure configuration.

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The security group IDs of the infrastructure configuration.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: subnetId
nested_items.description: The subnet ID of the infrastructure configuration.

nested_items.name: s3BucketName
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket in which to store the logs.

nested_items.name: s3KeyPrefix
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 path to the bucket where the logs are stored.

nested_items.name: keyPair
nested_items.description: The Amazon EC2 key pair of the infrastructure configuration.

nested_items.name: terminateInstanceOnFailure
nested_items.description: The terminate instance on failure configuration of the infrastructure configuration.

nested_items.name: snsTopicArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the SNS topic to which we send image build event notifications.

nested_items.name: dateCreated
nested_items.description: The date on which the infrastructure configuration was created.

nested_items.name: dateUpdated
nested_items.description: The date on which the infrastructure configuration was last updated.

nested_items.name: resourceTags
nested_items.description: The tags attached to the resource created by Image Builder.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: instanceMetadataOptions
nested_items.description: The instance metadata option settings for the infrastructure configuration.

nested_items.name: httpTokens
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a signed token header is required for instance metadata retrieval requests. The values affect the response as follows:

nested_items.name: httpPutResponseHopLimit
nested_items.description: Limit the number of hops that an instance metadata request can traverse to reach its destination. The default is one hop. However, if HTTP tokens are required, container image builds need a minimum of two hops.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: placement
nested_items.description: The instance placement settings that define where the instances that are launched from your image will run.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone where your build and test instances will launch.

nested_items.name: tenancy
nested_items.description: The tenancy of the instance. An instance with a tenancy of dedicated runs on single-tenant hardware. An instance with a tenancy of host runs on a Dedicated Host.

nested_items.name: hostId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Dedicated Host on which build and test instances run. This only applies if tenancy is host. If you specify the host ID, you must not specify the resource group ARN. If you specify both, Image Builder returns an error.

nested_items.name: hostResourceGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the host resource group in which to launch build and test instances. This only applies if tenancy is host. If you specify the resource group ARN, you must not specify the host ID. If you specify both, Image Builder returns an error.
